decks.notes: The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to establish a fast and aggressive board presence using efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, supported by powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional threats and token generation, while Unlicensed Disintegration offers removal and extra reach. The deck aims to pressure the opponent early on and maintain aggression throughout the game, using a combination of creatures, vehicles, and removal spells to close out games quickly.

The main objective of this deck is to establish a fast and aggressive board presence through efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional threats while also creating tokens to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Unlicensed Disintegration serves as removal while also dealing direct damage. Heart of Kiran and Pia Nalaar offer versatility and evasion, allowing for multiple lines of attack. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy, allowing for consistent early plays and enabling powerful late-game threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a strong and aggressive board presence through the use of efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Veteran Motorist, and Scrapheap Scrounger. Support cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, Unlicensed Disintegration, and Heart of Kiran help maintain pressure on the opponent while also providing additional utility. With a mix of evasion, removal, and versatile threats, the aim is to overwhelm opponents early and close out games before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on creating an aggressive board presence through early creature drops such as Toolcraft Exemplar and Thraben Inspector, backed up by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration to clear the way for attacks. The use of Vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan allow for additional damage and flexibility in combat. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides further creature support and a powerful anthem effect. Overall, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells while maintaining a strong board presence.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with creatures like Scrapheap Scrounger, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Veteran Motorist to apply early pressure on the opponent. Combining vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester with aggressive creatures allows for efficient attacks and quick damage output. Removal spells like Shock and Unlicensed Disintegration help clear the way for attacks while planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide additional threats and ways to pump up the team. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, supported by powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar. The deck also utilizes vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan to pressure the opponent and close out games quickly. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Shock help maintain control of the battlefield, while cards like Depala, Pilot Exemplar and Pia Nalaar provide additional value and synergy with the deck's overall game plan. The mana base is designed to support a fast and consistent aggressive strategy.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of counters and aggressive creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to place additional counters on creatures, making them bigger and more threatening. It also includes cards like Verdurous Gearhulk to further bolster the board state. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to handle any threats from the opponent, while also having the ability to search for specific cards using Traverse the Ulvenwald.

The main concept of this Jund Aggro deck is to play aggressive creatures like Greenbelt Rampager, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Longtusk Cub, while also utilizing energy cards like Voltaic Brawler and cards that generate energy like Attune with Aether. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence and deal damage to the opponent efficiently. Cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Unlicensed Disintegration provide additional reach and removal options. The inclusion of vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Fleetwheel Cruiser adds versatility to the deck's threats. The mana base supports these spells while also providing consistent mana for the deck's tri-color requirements.

The deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures with +1/+1 counters, utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk to pump up the team. Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Longtusk Cub provide early game aggression, while cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Bristling Hydra offer ways to pump up your creatures even more. Grasp of Darkness helps control the board and protect your creatures, while Aethersphere Harvester provides evasion and lifegain. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful offense.

This Golgari Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and synergistic energy boosts. The deck utilizes cards like Walking Ballista, Longtusk Cub, and Verdurous Gearhulk to quickly build up the board and pressure the opponent. Cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade help to maximize the potential of +1/+1 counters, while Attune with Aether and Aether Hub provide efficient mana fixing. Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness offer removal options, while Aethersphere Harvester offers additional evasion and lifegain. The deck aims to maintain aggression and establish dominance early on in the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Veteran Motorist. By utilizing vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester, along with removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Unlicensed Disintegration, the deck aims to deal damage efficiently and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Key cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Depala, Pilot Exemplar provide additional support and synergy to keep the pressure on the opponent. The mana base is optimized for consistent color access and smooth curve progression.

The key concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Walking Ballista, Winding Constrictor, and Grim Flayer, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent. Traverse the Ulvenwald provides valuable consistency and flexibility in finding key creatures or lands. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Ob Nixilis Reignited to generate additional value and card advantage. Overall, the deck excels at maintaining a strong aggressive strategy while still having access to removal options.

This deck focuses on aggressive tactics with a strong emphasis on synergy between +1/+1 counters and energy generation. By utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Servant of the Conduit, the deck can quickly build up a powerful board presence. The inclusion of cards like Walking Ballista and Verdurous Gearhulk allows for efficient removal and buffing of creatures. The deck also features a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the board. Overall, the Golgari Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient creatures while maintaining control over the battlefield.

The main concept of the deck is to utilize +1/+1 counters synergy and efficient creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By playing cards like Winding Constrictor, Rishkar, Peema Renegade, and Verdurous Gearhulk, the deck aims to build a board presence and grow its creatures to become threats that are hard to deal with. Additional removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness help to clear the way for attacks, while cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Catacomb Sifter provide additional value through token generation and card advantage.

This deck aims to create a powerful combo by using Saheeli Rai's ability to create a copy of Felidar Guardian, which can then flicker Saheeli Rai and repeat the process infinitely. In addition to the combo pieces, the deck includes control elements like Torrential Gearhulk and Disallow to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes card draw and removal to maintain consistency and survive until the combo can be assembled.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build a board presence and apply constant pressure on the opponent through aggressive creatures and cards that support them. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with strong early-game creatures like Thraben Inspector, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Scrapheap Scrounger. The inclusion of removal spells like Shock and Unlicensed Disintegration helps to clear the way for attacks while also providing direct damage to the opponent. The deck also utilizes vehicles like Heart of Kiran to further enhance the aggression and surprise the opponent with unexpected attacks.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and utilizing strong creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Heart of Kiran are used to increase the pressure on the opponent while cards like Unlicensed Disintegration provide removal options. The mana base is tuned for a smooth curve with plenty of untapped dual lands to ensure a fast start. Overall, the deck aims to flood the board with threats and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost aggressive creatures with strong synergy to quickly overwhelm opponents. By using cards like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger along with powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on opponents and quickly close out games. The inclusion of removal spells like Shock and Unlicensed Disintegration also helps to clear any blockers that might get in the way. Overall, the deck's strategy is to establish a fast and strong board presence to control the game and secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly put pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Toolcraft Exemplar, Thraben Inspector, and Scrapheap Scrounger. Support cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Unlicensed Disintegration help maintain board presence and deal damage efficiently. The deck also utilizes vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester for additional damage and evasion. Thalia, Heretic Cathar and Depala, Pilot Exemplar provide disruption and card advantage. The mana base is designed to ensure a smooth curve and consistent access to all colors needed for spells.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells to apply pressure on the opponent and control the board. It utilizes cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Toolcraft Exemplar to create a fast start, while cards like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration deal with opposing threats efficiently. The deck's mana base allows for a quick and smooth curve, maximizing the effectiveness of its aggressive strategy. With a mix of creatures and removal, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and maintain board dominance throughout the game.

This deck focuses on building an aggressive board presence quickly by utilizing low-cost creatures and powerful artifacts. By efficiently utilizing creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger along with vehicles like Heart of Kiran, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and strong offense. Support cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Fatal Push provide additional utility and removal options to keep the pressure on the opponent. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's spells and abilities.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on playing efficient creatures with low mana costs and utilizing powerful removal spells to control the board and push through damage quickly. The deck aims to create a strong early board presence with cards like Toolcraft Exemplar and Thraben Inspector while also having access to powerful planeswalkers like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar for additional pressure. Unlicensed Disintegration serves as a versatile removal spell that can also hit the opponent directly, while Heart of Kiran provides a resilient threat that can be crewed by the deck's creatures.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells in order to quickly chip away at their life total and secure a victory. By utilizing powerful cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Heart of Kiran, along with a mix of versatile creatures and removal spells, the deck is able to apply consistent pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure smooth casting of spells and consistent aggression throughout the game.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to quickly build a strong board presence with creature cards like Toolcraft Exemplar, Thraben Inspector, and Scrapheap Scrounger. This is supported by powerful artifacts like Heart of Kiran, which can be crewed by the low-cost creatures in the deck. Removal spells such as Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push help control the board and clear the way for aggressive attacks. The deck also features some powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar for additional threats and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient offense while maintaining some late-game resilience.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to establish a strong board presence quickly using efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Thraben Inspector, and Veteran Motorist. It utilizes vehicles such as Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan to apply pressure and deal damage to the opponent. Removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Metallic Rebuke help keep the board clear while cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Depala, Pilot Exemplar provide additional support and utility. The deck's mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent color access for its spells.

The main idea behind this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Bomat Courier and Inventor's Apprentice, along with efficient removal spells like Shock and Unlicensed Disintegration, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain board control throughout the game. Additionally, cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Pia Nalaar provide added value and flexibility to the strategy. The inclusion of artifacts like Scrapheap Scrounger and Implement of Combustion further supports the aggressive nature of the deck.

The main strategy of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced aggressive style of play, utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly. By consistently applying pressure and using cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Heart of Kiran to maintain board presence, the deck aims to finish the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The mana base is balanced between Swamps and Mountains to ensure consistent access to both black and red mana sources for casting spells efficiently.

The central idea behind this deck is to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy using efficient creatures and powerful planeswalkers like Gideon and Nissa. The deck aims to establish board presence early with cards like Thraben Inspector and Toolcraft Exemplar, while also utilizing strong removal options like Stasis Snare. By applying pressure and maintaining a strong board state with cards like Archangel Avacyn and Heart of Kiran, the deck seeks to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through combat damage. The mana base is built around generating the necessary colors for the aggressive creatures and spells.

The main concept of this Sultai Control deck is to have a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. By utilizing cards like Liliana, the Last Hope, Torrential Gearhulk, and Glimmer of Genius, the deck aims to efficiently deal with threats while staying ahead on resources. Traverse the Ulvenwald and Vessel of Nascency help find crucial cards, while Ishkanah, Grafwidow and Noxious Gearhulk provide additional threats and stabilizing tools. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements reliably.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying efficient creatures and using counters and removal to control the board while generating card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Verdurous Gearhulk and Walking Ballista while utilizing cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Tireless Tracker to maintain card advantage. The inclusion of Aethersphere Harvester provides some additional resilience against aggressive decks. Overall, the deck seeks to apply early pressure and maintain tempo to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By using cards like Cryptbreaker and Haunted Dead to quickly fill the graveyard, the deck can take advantage of recursion effects like Prized Amalgam and Scrapheap Scrounger to maintain a strong board presence. Key to the City provides card filtering and evasion for key threats like Voldaren Pariah, while Unlicensed Disintegration and Fiery Temper can deal with opposing threats efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan.
